full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal (RFP) for Temporary Help Services
### National Capital Region

**Document Information:**
* **Reference Number:** CB-5252-62108786
* **Publication Date:** 2023-05-05
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-09T15:00:00

**Summary:** The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Temporary Help Services provider through a Request for Proposal (RFP). The successful bidder will provide specialized expertise to support the department's operations in the National Capital Region.

**Key Details:**

* **Term:** May 29, 2023, to April 26, 2024
* **Security Level:** FSC Secret
* **Scope of Work:** Provision of specialized expertise to support department operations

**Eligible Bidders:** Suppliers under EN578-172870 have been invited to submit a proposal. Eligible suppliers must be qualified under the following streams and categories: Stream 13 - Special Advisor.

**Description of Requirement:** DND requires Temporary Help Services to support department operations. The successful provider must possess a high level of expertise and be able to provide services in a timely and efficient manner.

**Notice and Attachments:**

* **Notice URL:** Not applicable
* **Attachments:**
	+ English version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5252/s4444056--rfp-%28english-version.pdf
	+ French version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5252/s4444056--rfp-%28french-version.pdf

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* **Email:** CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** 613-971-795

This RFP is open to eligible suppliers who possess the required expertise and can provide high-quality services to support DND operations. Interested suppliers should review the adapted notice and submit a proposal. The successful bidder will be awarded a contract to provide Temporary Help Services to DND.

Note: Trade agreements and regions of opportunity and delivery have been omitted, as they were not deemed relevant to the summary of the tender announcement. SellerIDicksuch information if relevents to your stylesheet in the future. Moreover, it's encouraged to publish instructions
